Name: The World's Hardest Game 3D 2
About the game: Easy to play, very hard to finish. Can you beat The World's Hardest Game 3D 2 ? The World's Hardest Game , which you used to play on flash game sites, is now with you in 3D. Good luck in this challenging game of 30 unique levels! Features Cute graphics and colorful atmosphere Smooth gameplay 30 Different challenging levels Nice and different soundtracks Long Play Time New levels will be added with updates Auto save system Top Down View You can change to Top Down View to see the whole level, but you can't move in Top Down View .
